resources.description:
Combined Land--Ocean Temperature Anomaly (C) CR 1200km 1880 to 2012.
GLOBAL Temperature Anomalies in .01 C     base period: 1951-1980

As calculated by Python CCC code.
resources.name: CCC Temperature anomaly data

resources.description: This is the preprint version of the paper. There are no material differences in the final version but for copyright reasons it cannot be published here.
resources.name: PDF preprint

resources.description:
Goddard Institute for Space Studies Surface Temperature Analysis (GISTEMP) results in red, and Clear Climate Code (CCC) ccc-gistemp results in blue. We have lowered the ccc-gistemp line by 0.2 degrees Celsius for clarity, otherwise it would be hidden by the GISTEMP line.

The green line (right-hand scale) shows the difference between the two sets of results.
resources.name: Comparison graph: GISTEMP/ccc

organization.description:
Weather, temperature, carbon, water, soil and all other kinds of climate related open data.  Including (but not limited to) data about:

 * the atmosphere
 * the weather
 * air quality
 * temperature
 * the ocean
 * rivers
 * water levels
 * water quality
 * carbon emissions
 * pollution
 * soil erosion
 * biodiversity

For background information see [blog on article on IPCC data](http://blog.okfn.org/2007/11/20/the-ipcc-data-distribution-centre-environmental-data-licensing/), [the wiki](http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData), and [this other blog article](http://blog.okfn.org/2009/12/05/climate-change-climate-sceptics-and-open-data/). If you would like to help update or maintain this group, please [get in touch](http://okfn.org/contact)!

The climate data group is supported by the [Open Knowledge Foundation](http://www.okfn.org), [Clear Climate Code](http://clearclimatecode.org/) and the scientists at [Real Climate](http://www.realclimate.org/).

### Existing Lists of Climate Datasets to Migrate Here

 * <http://www.realclimate.org/index.php/data-sources/>
 * <http://ergodd.zoo.ox.ac.uk/eden/index.php?p=10>
 * <http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData/DatabaseOfEmissionsData>
 * <http://wiki.okfn.org/OpenEnvironmentalData>
organization.title: Climate Data
organization.name: climatedata

name: ccc-gistemp
notes:
Clear Climate Code: Rewriting Legacy Science Software for Clarity

Nick Barnes and David Jones

IEEE Software vol 28 no 6, pp 36-42, Nov-Dec 2011
doi:10:1109/MS.2011.113

A reconstruction of the global historical temperature record from land and sea surface temperature records.
title: ccc-gistemp
